text: The Louisiana State Legislature ()A common name for the Louisiana State Legislature is "the General Assembly", a name used first in English in the 1812 Louisiana Constitution,() which in turn is a translation of French Assemblée générale and found in other states to designate the lower house. is the state legislature of the U.S. state of Louisiana. It is a bicameral body, made up by the lower house, the Louisiana House of Representatives with 105 representatives, and the upper house, the Louisiana State Senate with 39 senators. ==References== Category:Politics of Louisiana Category:Louisiana State Legislature
title: Louisiana State Legislature
